channel.title: "Next Team Fortress 2 video will meet the Medic"?
channel.description:
"The next TF2 video will star the Medic, according to a fan who recently visited Valve’s offices. While wandering around Valve HQ the visitor got to see a preview version of the next TF2 short film and reported back to fans on the Steam forums, saying that the video is almost finished, it’s coming out soon, and it’s going to be one of the best TF2 videos yet."
[url='https://www.pcgamer.com/2011/03/22/next-team-fortress-2-video-will-meet-the-medic/']https://www.pcgamer.com/2011/03/22/next-team-fortress-2-video-will-meet-the-medic/[/url]
Discuss.

item.title: "Next Team Fortress 2 video will meet the Medic"?

item.source: "Next Team Fortress 2 video will meet the Medic"?

item.title: "Next Team Fortress 2 video will meet the Medic"?
item.dc:creator: Acristoff
item.description:
I remember them saying that they finished Meet the medic at some point but then decided to scrap it due to not being satisfied with it, that takes serious dedication. I imagine Meet the pyro will be done horror movie style.

Read full topic
item.source: "Next Team Fortress 2 video will meet the Medic"?

item.title: "Next Team Fortress 2 video will meet the Medic"?
item.dc:creator: Dias
item.description:
DethklokSoldier:

99% of the "I got to visit the offices of… statements are bullshit, so I don’t trust it.

Actually, from what I’ve seen, Valve is pretty cool with giving tours to people. I hope to go someday.

I’m pretty sure it’s been said before that the Pyro video would be the last, so saying that the medic video is next isn’t much of a reveal. I’m sure they’re fine with whomever saying the medic video is nearing completion.

Read full topic
item.source: "Next Team Fortress 2 video will meet the Medic"?

item.title: "Next Team Fortress 2 video will meet the Medic"?
item.dc:creator: Imonfire
item.description:
Aaron:

“…and reported back to fans on the Steam forums, saying that the video is almost finished […] and it’s going to be one of the best TF2 videos yet.”

Of course they say it’s going to be the best TF2 video ever, it wouldn’t really be good marketing if they said the opposite.

Read full topic

99% of the “I got to visit the offices of _________ and their next _____________ will be coming out soon” statements are bullshit, so I don’t trust it.

This guy had pics, so it happened.
